events.text:
Other monkeys came from the cave. 
And everyone was asking if he is fine. He trembled and cried. 
then they said something that lessened his cries. 
That was my first time watching the humans. 
The humans then danced to a fireplace, 
ate cooked meat from the animal that they killed while interacting with others, 
and hugged each other in a room where there are only two of them. 
I did not get why they do this and I still don't. 
This is the first time I had seen something so unfamiliar since the world had been existing. 
It confuses me. 
I thought following them for longer would give me the answer.
